languages.text: "Сестра Арджента..." {n}Джай окидывает сороритку почти что сальным взглядом.{/n} "Я наслышана о ваших деяниях на Футфоле, но и предположить не могла, что за досужими сплетнями скрывается ангельская красота!"

"Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента..." {n}Джай окидывает сороритку почти что сальным взглядом.{/n} "Я наслышана о ваших деяниях на Футфоле, но и предположить не могла, что за досужими сплетнями скрывается ангельская красота!"

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous look-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed that, behind idle gossip, there was angelic beauty!"

"Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous look-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed that, behind idle gossip, there was angelic beauty!"

"Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

"Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

"Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女……”{n}婕伊以几乎算得上充满色欲的目光打量着她。{/n}“我听说过你在落脚港的所有事迹，但我从来没想过，那些传言的背后，居然是这样一位天使般的美人儿！”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女……”{n}婕伊以几乎算得上充满色欲的目光打量着她。{/n}“我听说过你在落脚港的所有事迹，但我从来没想过，那些传言的背后，居然是这样一位天使般的美人儿！”

languages.text: «Hermana Argenta...». {n}Jae la examina casi con lascivia.{/n} «Me han contado todas sus hazañas en Paso, pero ¡jamás habría imaginado que detrás de tantas habladurías se escondería un rostro tan angelical!».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: «Hermana Argenta...». {n}Jae la examina casi con lascivia.{/n} «Me han contado todas sus hazañas en Paso, pero ¡jamás habría imaginado que detrás de tantas habladurías se escondería un rostro tan angelical!».

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ…」{n}ジェイはアルジェンタに、熱っぽい視線を送る。 {/n}「フットフォールでのアンタの偉業は全て聞いていたけど、あんな根も葉もない噂の裏に天使のような美しい女性がいたとはね！」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ…」{n}ジェイはアルジェンタに、熱っぽい視線を送る。 {/n}「フットフォールでのアンタの偉業は全て聞いていたけど、あんな根も葉もない噂の裏に天使のような美しい女性がいたとはね！」

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta ..." {n}Jae wirft ihr einen fast schon lüsternen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich habe alles über Eure Taten auf Footfall gehört, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass sich hinter dem leeren Geschwätz eine engelhafte Schönheit verbirgt!"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta ..." {n}Jae wirft ihr einen fast schon lüsternen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich habe alles über Eure Taten auf Footfall gehört, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass sich hinter dem leeren Geschwätz eine engelhafte Schönheit verbirgt!"

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta... » {n}Jae l'observe des pieds à la tête, d'un regard presque lubrique.{/n} « J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de vos exploits à Castel, mais je n'aurais jamais cru que toutes ces histoires cachaient une beauté aussi angélique ! »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta... » {n}Jae l'observe des pieds à la tête, d'un regard presque lubrique.{/n} « J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de vos exploits à Castel, mais je n'aurais jamais cru que toutes ces histoires cachaient une beauté aussi angélique ! »

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta..." {n}Jae onu neredeyse şehvetle süzüyor.{/n} "Binliman'da yaptıklarınızı duymuştum. Tüm o boş dedikoduların meleksi bir güzellikten bahsettiğini hiç tahmin etmezdim!"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta..." {n}Jae gives her an almost lecherous once-over.{/n} "I've heard all about your deeds on Footfall, but I never would have guessed there was an angelic beauty behind all the idle gossip!"

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta..." {n}Jae onu neredeyse şehvetle süzüyor.{/n} "Binliman'daki yaptıklarınızı duymuştum ama tüm o boş dedikoduların arkasında meleksi bir güzellik olduğunu asla tahmin edemezdim!"
